runs.comm: good delivery from Jarvis first up, shapes away from outside off on a length, but he has overstepped
even better, Jarvis gets it swinging away and full in the blockhole  outside off, Guptill jabs it away
sharp work from Coventry at extra cover saves a boundary, Guptill covered for the away movement and drove the full one hard, Coventry dives to his right to snap up the ball
slants it wide down the leg side
pushes to point and looks for the single, direct hit and he was out, by a mile
Jarvis shortens the length and gets it to climb outside off, he stays in the crease and drops it softly on the off side
scoops the lofted shot just over mid off, who scrambles back and just about gets a hand to it, was always out of his reach
angled it in, but it pitched on leg and carried on down leg,
pushed on the off side, Jarvis' somewhat erratic over is over
appeal for lbw first ball as he presses forward, that looked gone, slid in from wide of the crease and hit in front of middle, looked to be taking out leg
worked in front of square leg
dabbed behind point for a sharp single
slides it in from wide of the crease, pushed back to the bowler
swung behind square leg
worked in front of square leg, wide of the man in the deep for a couple
Baz gives Jarvis the charge, picks the full delivery as he makes a bit of room outside leg and clatters it high over the long off boundary
pushed away for a single
opens the face to a length ball and runs it straight to point
digs it in but it ends down the pads and is nudged through square leg
that will help, full, on the pads, Baz likes the angle, he flicks with fast hands and it flies behind square leg
good one to end the over, full and near the blockhole, jabbed away
down the track, is hit on the pad as he pushes outside the line, ball rolls towards extra cover, Price puts in half an appeal
sliding in from a length, worked with the angle towards square leg
lots of air on this one and he almost yorks himself as he misses with an attempted flick
pushed off the front foot for a single
down the track, gets inside the line and smashes it hard, past a diving mid off
pushes off the front foot off the inner half of the bat down to long on
has another dash down the track, Elton drops it short and in to the batsman who calmly ;lets it go over him as he ducks
another charge down the track, might as well take guard there, off the inside half of the bat to long on
width this time, slapped straight to cover
Elton drags it from wide of the crease down leg, Zimbabwe have hardly done themselves any favours with the line all over the place
full one swung down the ground to long on
angled in full this time, he backs away a tad and squeezes the push straight past the non-striker
Guptill gets maximum, slithers down the track, not to the pitch but picks it up superbly over the straight boundary
angled one worked off the pads for a run
pushed through fullish, earns a straight-batted defensive prod
whoa, where did that come from, grip, bounce and turn from off stump for Price, a surprised Baz manages to get bat out of the way
pushed down the track
worked on the leg side for a single
on the pads again, easily flicked through square leg
flicked just past the man at midwicket
slightly short, he pulls in to the ground in front of square leg
drops it short and well outside off as Baz comes screaming down the track, was about a foot away from the ball in the end

dropped by Taylor at midwicket, Baz went for the big flick over square leg off a full one, leading edge swirled high in the air, Taylor went back from midwicket, but it popped out of his hands, he seems to have done some damage while falling as his head hit the ground
worked through midwicket for one
full delivery, whipped with the turn in front of square leg
opens up and drags a flat delivery through square leg
cannot get much on this one turning in a tad, pushed back to Utseya
pushes in front of cover for a single
presses forward and pushes with the turn towards the non-striker
calmly worked with the turn in front of square leg for one
there was width this time, but he goes after it and mistimes it to cover
shot! no stopping this one, Baz lines up the deep square leg boundary, swivels in the crease and flicks a length ball powerfully, some timing, and some bat speed, hits the rope on the full
superb stroke, firm hard loft over extra cover, width outside off and he launched in to the shot
hit on the off side for one
Guptill pays attention to niceties like getting the front foot out, gets bat in front of pad to push a full ball to long on
Baz obviously could not care for such trifles, the charge is on his mind, out he comes and leaves Coventry with zero chance of stopping this one at sweeper cover
Zimbabwe's drops continue to pile up this home season, Waller had the swing from Guptill covered as he ran to his right at long on, but it slipped through his hands, just like that
pushed for a single off the front foot
goes for the reverse sweep now, straight to short third man
full toss but he helps it to the man at short fine leg
worked quietly in front of square leg for one
steady line on off stump first up, from a fullish length, he comes forward and blocks tentatively
jeez, Jarvis continues to spear it down the leg side, starts leg and goes further down
Baz is ready with the dash down the wicket next ball, reaches the pitch of this one and slaps it through extra cover
smartly done, Jarvis went full on leg with the angle, Baz shuffled across and tickled it deftly well past short fine leg
too much now, even by Baz's standards, he stands back and tries a cute little reverse paddle, misses and is out of breath after he cops a blow on the body
no issues this time, he gets to 50 with an inside out loft over extra cover for a couple
imperious, Jarvis is disappearing all over now, full toss, he stands back and whips it in a flash, flat and just over a leaping Waller at deep square leg
Guptill wants a share of the action too, he forehands a length ball straight back at the bowler, who fortunately is able to get hands out of the way
dabbed on the off side for one
oh well, loopy attempted slow full toss ending high outside off, Baz waits for it to arrive and dispatches it disdainfully over deep midwicket
Baz wants to get this done with, this is in the slot, pitched up on the stumps, and he golf-swings it over long off
clobbers another full delivery but Mutizwa with some deft work in the wide long off rope saves the boundary, runnning across, and lobbing the ball in as he gets close to the rope
length ball worked for a single
slow length ball angled in, dinked towards midwicket
that came so slowly that Guptill had enough time to contemplate a pull, withdraw out of it and dab it behind point
Guptill gets maximum now, right in the hitting zone, full under the bat, clean swing and that has been lost beyond wide long on
pushes forward with a straight bat, single to long off
slapped to extra cover off the back foot
squeezes the drive wide of long off for a couple more
stands a foot outside leg, Price follows him and he pushes it back to the bowler
backs away even further outside leg, Price drops it a touch short as he angles it in, he drags the pull through midwicket
Baz ends in typical fashion, doesn't matter that Price fires it in flat and quick, Baz is already way down the track and has enough momentum to lift the ball high over wide long on to end the game
